description: Retrieves a subset of information about all the findings filters for an account.

nested_items.name: findingsFilterListItems
nested_items.description: An array of objects, one for each filter that's associated with the account.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action that's performed on findings that match the filter criteria. Possible values are: ARCHIVE, suppress (automatically archive) the findings; and, NOOP, don't perform any action on the findings.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the filter.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the filter.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The custom name of the filter.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The string to use in a subsequent request to get the next page of results in a paginated response. This value is null if there are no additional pages.
